text: John Cunningham (1868 – unknown) was a Scottish footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Glasgow. He played for Benburb, Glasgow Hibernian, Celtic, Partick Thistle, Heart of Midlothian, Rangers, Thistle, Preston North End, Sheffield United, Aston Villa, Wigan County, and Manchester United. ==See also== *Played for Celtic and Rangers ==References== ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile *Profile at The Celtic wiki Category:1868 births Category:Footballers from Glasgow Category:Scottish footballers Category:Benburb F.C. players Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Celtic F.C. players Category:Rangers F.C. players Category:Partick Thistle F.C. players Category:Preston North End F.C. players Category:Heart of Midlothian F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Aston Villa F.C. players Category:Year of death missing Category:Wigan County F.C. players Category:Thistle F.C. players Category:Association football forwards
title: John Cunningham (Scottish footballer)
